verses.verse: Dare <WG5111> any <WG5100> of you, having <WG2192> a matter <WG4229> against <WG4314> another, <WG2087> go to law <WG2919> before <WG1909> the unjust, <WG94> and not before <WG1909> the saints? <WG40>

Do you not know <WG1492> that the saints <WG40> shall judge <WG2919> the world? <WG2889> and if <WG1487> the world <WG2889> shall be judged <WG2919> by you, are you unworthy <WG370> to judge <WG2922> the smallest <WG1646> matters?
Know <WG1492> you not that we shall judge <WG2919> angels? <WG32> how <WG3386> much <WG3386> more <WG1065> things that pertain to this life? <WG982>
If <WG1437> then <WG3767> you have <WG2192> judgments <WG2922> of things pertaining to this life, <WG982> set <WG2523> them to judge who are least <WG1848> esteemed <WG1848> in the church. <WG1577>

I speak <WG3004> to your <WG5213> shame. <WG1791> Is it so, <WG3779> that there is not a wise <WG4680> man among <WG1722> you? no, not one that shall be able <WG1410> to judge <WG1252> between <WG303> <WG3319> his brothers? <WG80>
But brother <WG80> goes to law <WG2919> with brother, <WG80> and that before <WG1909> the unbelievers. <WG571>

Now <WG2236> therefore <WG3767> there is utterly <WG3654> a fault <WG2275> among <WG1722> you, because <WG3754> you go to law <WG2917> one <WG1438> with another. <WG1438> Why <WG1302> do you not rather <WG3123> take wrong? <WG91> why <WG1302> do you not rather <WG3123> suffer yourselves to be defrauded? <WG650>
No, <WG235> you do wrong, <WG91> and defraud, <WG650> and that your brothers. <WG80>

Know <WG1492> you not that the unrighteous <WG94> shall not inherit <WG2816> the kingdom <WG932> of God? <WG2316> Be not deceived: <WG4105> neither <WG3777> fornicators, <WG4205> nor <WG3777> idolaters, <WG1496> nor <WG3777> adulterers, <WG3432> nor <WG3777> effeminate, <WG3120> nor <WG3777> abusers <WG733> of themselves with mankind, <WG733>

Nor <WG3777> thieves, <WG2812> nor <WG3777> covetous, <WG4123> nor <WG3756> drunkards, <WG3183> nor <WG3756> revilers, <WG3060> nor <WG3756> extortionists, <WG727> shall inherit <WG2816> the kingdom <WG932> of God. <WG2316>

And such <WG5023> were some <WG5100> of you: but you are washed, <WG628> but you are sanctified, <WG37> but you are justified <WG1344> in the name <WG3686> of the Lord <WG2962> Jesus, <WG2424> and by the Spirit <WG4151> of our God. <WG2316>

All <WG3956> things are lawful <WG1832> to me, but all <WG3956> things are not expedient: <WG4851> all <WG3956> things are lawful <WG1832> for me, but I will not be brought <WG1850> under <WG5259> the power <WG1850> of any. <WG5100>

Meats <WG1033> for the belly, <WG2836> and the belly <WG2836> for meats: <WG1033> but God <WG2316> shall destroy <WG2673> both <WG2532> it and them. Now <WG1161> the body <WG4983> is not for fornication, <WG4202> but for the Lord; <WG2962> and the Lord <WG2962> for the body. <WG4983>
And God <WG2316> has both <WG2532> raised <WG1453> up the Lord, <WG2962> and will also <WG2532> raise <WG1825> up us by his own <WG848> power. <WG1411>

Know <WG1492> you not that your <WG5216> bodies <WG4983> are the members <WG3196> of Christ? <WG5547> shall I then <WG3767> take <WG142> the members <WG3196> of Christ, <WG5547> and make <WG4160> them the members <WG3196> of an harlot? <WG4204> God <WG3361> <WG1096> forbid. <WG3361> <WG1096>
What? <WG2228> know <WG1492> you not that he which is joined <WG2853> to an harlot <WG4204> is one <WG1520> body? <WG4983> for two, <WG1417> said <WG5346> he, shall be one <WG3391> flesh. <WG4561>
But he that is joined <WG2853> to the Lord <WG2962> is one <WG1520> spirit. <WG4151>

Flee <WG5343> fornication. <WG4202> Every <WG3956> sin <WG265> that a man <WG444> does <WG4160> is without <WG1622> the body; <WG4983> but he that commits <WG4203> fornication <WG4203> sins <WG264> against <WG1519> his own <WG2398> body. <WG4983>

What? <WG2228> know <WG1492> you not that your <WG1438> body <WG4983> is the temple <WG3485> of the Holy <WG40> Ghost <WG4151> which <WG3739> is in you, which you have <WG2192> of God, <WG2316> and you are not your <WG5216> own? <WG1438>

For you are bought <WG59> with a price: <WG5092> therefore <WG1211> glorify <WG1392> God <WG2316> in your <WG5216> body, <WG4983> and in your <WG5216> spirit, <WG4151> which <WG3748> are God's. <WG2316>
